channel.title: [Extremely important addon to the game] Proper Game Icon
channel.description:
I think it's a bit silly that in 2015, the black mesa mod uses the hl2 logo when alt-tabbed, a simple fix for this is just to take this icon: [url]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/7315285/Maps/BlackMesa/game.ico[/url] Remake it if needed.
Drop it in the resource folder of the bms_misc_dir.vpk file. So.. I need a dev to do that. K thx bai! :slight_smile:

item.title: [Extremely important addon to the game] Proper Game Icon
item.dc:creator: Gabe
item.description:
Crypt:

Heresy! Blasphemy! Poppycock! The icon entirely external to the game is obviously important.

Agreed! Ever since viewing this thread, my experience playing Black Mesa has been utterly ruined by this glaringly obvious and bothersome error.

While one might argue that listing something so minuscule that it would take a concentrated effort to notice and then prioritizing it over other glaring issues, as well as attracting attention to said thread with the title “Extremely Important” is a mischievous act, that should warrant no further attention besides a simple “we’ll get to it eventually”… I disagree. But who am I to speak on others behalf? I have constructed this poll as a simple way for users to express what they feel is the most refractory issue they wish to be incorporated into the next update, please, share your opinions! Regardless, I believe should similar issues arise, they should be directed and addressed as “simple suggestions”.

item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
We’ll get to this, eventually.

It’s one of those things where, a long time ago, someone on the team (which may or may not have been me) one day said…“Hey, why is the Steam icon ugly?” “Hey, why do we still have the HL2 icon for our .exe? Shouldn’t we fix that?”

And then…nothing happened. Nobody knows why or how. It’s one of those weirdly specific things to fix due to the way our content is structured internally, we have to talk to our release guy to fix it, I think.
